verses.verse: I <S%G4921>commend<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5402>Phoebe<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%>, who <S%G5607>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchreae<s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G4327>receive<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G516>worthily<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G3936>assist<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> in1722, 3739 <S%G302>whatsoever<s%> <S%G4229>matter<s%> she may have <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> <S%G3778>herself<s%> also hath <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>helper<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%>, and2532, 2532 of <S%G846>mine<s%> own <S%G1700>self<s%>.

who3748, 5294 <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> laid <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks<s%>; unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> salute the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>. <S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Asia<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G559>Apelles<s%> the <S%G1384>approved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>. <S%G782>Salute<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the household of <S%G711>Aristobulus<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G4648>mark<s%> them that are <S%G4160>causing<s%> the <S%G1370>divisions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> occasions of <S%G4625>stumbling<s%>, contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> turn <S%G1578>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> is come <S%G864>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5463>men<s%>. I rejoice <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> I would <S%G2309>have<s%> you5209, 1511 <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G185>simple<s%> unto <S%G1519>that<s%> which is <S%G2556>evil<s%>.

Gaius <S%G1050><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3581>host<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G1577>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>, <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G2037>Erastus<s%> the <S%G3623>treasurer<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2890>Quartus<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%>.

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, is made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>:
